summary:
My aim is to create inclusive and entrepreneurial communities managing our planet with responsibility, gratitude and fun. Back in Italy I loved to explore mountains and walk along rivers, trying to understand the processes that shaped the Earth surface and its interactions with human activities. This brought me to study Earth Sciences, do a PhD and then to work as a researcher and advisor. 
At the same time, I love to see people, communities and plants grow. As a lecturer at the HAN I train the future generation of geography teachers. Next to my job I volunteer for education in sustainability and entrepreneurship and for regenerative agriculture.
